response.overview: Emma, Alex, and ‘Drea have been the best of friends since sperm. They’ve always been there for each other, always had each other's backs, and have never spent a school year apart. They’re ride or die friends. When Emma invites the girls over for a sleepover, they decide to tempt fate with a Magic 8 Ball. The next morning, they’ve awoken to realize that they’re in a stereotypical teen movie. They go to school as they normally would and quickly realize who’s who in this illogical universe. They learn that the only way to escape this nonviable nightmare is to just go through the motions of a stereotypical teen movie.
response.tagline: Cliché tropes are always the best.
response.title: A Stereotypical Teen Movie
